title: Moonshine Lullaby: a Novel
description: Tanya Lauterbach, 17-year-old daughter of country music diva Rita Harding, didn't want to go stay with her father's family in the Blue Ridge Mountains while her mother went on a world tour. She was a city girl! She almost had to be dragged out kicking and screaming. But once she was there, the hills began to work their magic...part of which included a handsome young man with a mysterious past and possibly dangerous present....
author: Rozita Berry
